channel.title: Trash can
channel.description:
Well, I have owned a few sites over my time.
One thing that makes a site stand out, not buy its friendly users/popularity.. but my its mess. to be honest, moparisthebest.com/moparisthebest.com would be the most messiest site i have EVER come across.
So to fix this up why not:
Make a new forum "Trash can". Where all staff send locked links so 1) they are never deleted until a admin decideds to clean the bin out 2) makes it look more neat
make it so users can see the locked topics but not post...
Just a helpful suggestion

item.title: Trash can
item.dc:creator: @sppt sppt
item.description:
@sppt wrote:

there’s a difference between locked and deleted topics, locked topics can contain useful information, whereas deleted topics don’t, most of the time
if you’d throw all locked topics in a single section, you would never know what it might be about by reading the title, and it makes searching specific topics harder

Read full topic

item.title: Trash can
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

[quote=“TiLt, post:1, topic:178698”]Well, I have owned a few sites over my time.

One thing that makes a site stand out, not buy its friendly users/popularity… but my its mess. to be honest, moparisthebest.com/moparisthebest.com would be the most messiest site i have EVER come across.

So to fix this up why not:

Make a new forum “Trash can”. Where all staff send locked links so

  1. they are never deleted until a admin decideds to clean the bin out
  2. makes it look more neat

make it so users can see the locked topics but not post…

Just a helpful suggestion[/quote] Why Would normal users be allowed to view it? Then they would be allowed to view all the private threads from the staff forum and the moparscape VET forum… And btw… We have a trash can and there is also a forum where all the reports get sent to.

Read full topic
